events.message: I have just filed a claim regarding the car accident that occurred last night involving my vehicle and another car at the intersection.
The claim has been categorised under auto accident after reviewing the initial report and related documents submitted by the claimant.
An agent has been assigned to your case to ensure all necessary steps are taken to process your auto accident claim efficiently.
We acknowledge receipt of your claim for the vehicle collision and assure you that the process will proceed swiftly.
Please submit the police report, photos of the damages to your vehicle, and repair estimates to proceed with investigation.
All requested documents including the police report and repair bill have been uploaded and received by the claims department.
Investigation into the circumstances of the collision has commenced to validate coverage and liability.
Investigation has been completed confirming the other driverâ€™s fault and validating your claim coverage under policy terms.
A settlement has been proposed covering the total damages to your vehicle as per the repair estimates you provided.
You have responded positively to the settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with the responsiveness of the claims team.
Your claim has been officially approved and we will proceed with payment authorization immediately.
The payment for your car repairs has been issued and should be received within 3 business days.
Your auto accident claim is now officially closed. We thank you for your cooperation and hope for your continued safe driving.
All records related to your vehicle accident claim have been archived securely in our system for future reference.
